Verses: 1 indha Melkisedhekku Saalemin Raajaavum, Unnadhamaana Dhevanudaiya Aasaariyanumaayirundhaan; Raajaakkalai Muriyadiththuvandha Aabiragaamukku Ivan Edhirkondupoi, Avanai Aaseervadhiththaan.

2 ivanukku Aabiragaam Ellaavatrilum Thasamapaagam Koduththaan; Ivanudaiya Mudharperaagiya Melkisedhekku Enbadharku Needhiyin Raajaa Endrum, Pinbu Saalemin Raajaa Enbadharku Samaadhaanaththin Raajaa Endrum Aruththamaam.

3 ivan Thagappanum Thaayum Vamsavaralaarum Illaadhavan; Ivan Naatkalin Thuvakkamum Jeevanin Mudivumudaiyavanaayiraamal, Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranukku Oppaanavanaai Endrendraikkum Aasaariyanaaga Nilaiththirukkiraan.
4 ivan Evvalavu Periyavanaayirukkiraan Paarungal; Koththiraththalaivanaagiya Aabiragaam Mudhalaai Kollaiyidappatta Porulgalil Ivanukku Thasamapaagam Koduththaan.

5 leviyin Puththiraril Aasaariyaththuvaththai Adaigiravargalum, Aabiragaamin Araiyilirundhu Vandha Thangal Sagodhararaana Janangalin Kaiyile Niyaayappiramaanaththinpadi Thasamapaagam Vaangugiradharku Kattalaipetrirukkiraargal.
6 aagilum, Avargaludaiya Vamsa Varisaiyil Varaadhavanaagiya Ivan Aabiragaamin Kaiyil Thasamapaagam Vaangi, Vaakkuththaththangalai Petravanai Aaseervadhiththaan.
7 siriyavan Periyavanaale Aaseervadhikkappaduvaan, Adharku Sandhegamillai.
8 andriyum, Inge, Marikkira Manushargal Thasamapaagam Vaangugiraargal; Angeyo, Pizhaiththirukkiraan Endru Saatchipetravan Vaanginaan.
9 andriyum, Melkisedhekku Aabiragaamukku Edhirkonduponapodhu, Leviyaanavan Than Thagappanudaiya Araiyilirundhapadiyaal,
10 thasamapaagam Vaangugira Avanum Aabiragaamin Moolamaai Thasamapaagam Koduththaan Endru Sollalaam.

11 allaamalum, Isravel Janangal Levikoththira Aasaariya Muraimaikkutpattirundhallavo Niyaayappiramaanaththai Petraargal; Andha Aasaariya Muraimaiyinaale Pooranappadudhal Undaayirukkumaanaal, Aaronudaiya Muraimaiyinpadi Azhaikkappadaamal, Melkisedhekkinudaiya Muraimaiyinpadi Azhaikkappatta Veroru Aasaariyar Ezhumbavenduvadhenna?
12 aasaariyaththuvam Maatrappattirukkumeyaanaal, Niyaayappiramaanamum Maatrappadavendiyadhaagum.
13 ivaigal Evaraikkuriththu Sollappattirukkiradho, Avar Veroru Koththiraththukkullaanavaraayirukkiraare; Andha Koththiraththil Oruvanaagilum Balibeedaththu Oozhiyam Seydhadhillaiye.
14 nammudaiya Karththar Yoodhaakoththiraththil Thondrinaarenpadhu Pirasiththamaayirukkiradhu; Andha Koththiraththaaraikkuriththu Mose Aasaariyaththuvaththaippatri Ondrum Sollavillaiye.
15 allaamalum, Melkisedhekkukku Oppaai Veroru Aasaariyar Ezhumpugiraarendru Solliyiruppadhinaal, Mersolliyadhu Migavum Pirasiththamaai Vilangugiradhu.
16 avar Maamsa Sambandhamaana Kattalaiyaagiya Niyaayappiramaanaththinpadi Aasaariyaraagaamal,
17 neer Melkisedhekkin Muraimaiyinpadi Endrendraikkum Aasaariyaraayirukkireer Endru Solliya Saatchikkuththakkadhaaga Azhiyaadha Jeevanukkuriya Vallamaiyinpadiye Aasaariyaraanaar.
18 mundhina Kattalai Belaveenamulladhum Payanatradhumaayirundhadhinimiththam Maatrappattadhu.
19 niyaayappiramaanamaanadhu Ondraiyum Pooranappaduththavillai, Adhiga Nanmaiyaana Nambikkaiyai Varuvippadho Pooranappaduththugiradhu; Andha Nambikkaiyinaale Dhevanidaththil Serugirom.

20 andriyum, Avargal Aanaiyillaamal Aasaariyaraakkappadugiraargal; Ivaro: Neer Melkisedhekkin Muraimaiyinpadi Endrendraikkum Aasaariyaraayirukkireer Endru Karththar Aanaiyittaar, Manammaaraamalum Iruppaar Endru Thammudane Sonnavaraale Aanaiyode Aasaariyaraanaar.
21 aanadhaal, Yesuvaanavar Aanaiyinpadiye Aasaariyaraakkappattadhu Evvalavu Viseshiththa Kaariyamo,
22 avvalavu Viseshiththa Udanpadikkaikku Pinaiyaaliyaanaar.
23 andriyum, Avargal Maranaththinimiththam Nilaiththirukkakkoodaadhavargalaanapadiyaal, Aasaariyaraakkappadugiravargal Anegaraayirukkiraargal.
24 ivaro Endrendraikkum Nilaiththirukkirapadiyinaale, Maarippogaadha Aasaariyaththuvamullavaraayirukkiraar.
25 melum, Thamadhu Moolamaai Dhevanidaththil Serugiravargalukkaaga Vendudhalseyyumpadikku Avar Eppozhudhum Uyirodirukkiravaraagaiyaal Avargalai Mutrumudiya Iratchikka Vallavaraayumirukkiraar.
26 parisuththarum, Kutramatravarum, Maasillaadhavarum, Paavigalukku Vilaginavarum, Vaanangalilum Uyarndhavarumaayirukkira Ivvidhamaana Piradhaana Aasaariyar Namakku Etravaraayirukkiraar.

27 avar Piradhaana Aasaariyargalaippola Munbu Sondha Paavangalukkaagavum, Pinbu Janangaludaiya Paavangalukkaagavum Naadorum Baliyidavenduvadhillai; Enenil Thammaiththaame Baliyittadhinaale Oredharam Seydhu Mudiththaar.

28 niyaayappiramaanamaanadhu Belaveenamulla Manushargalai Piradhaana Aasaariyaraaka Erpaduththugiradhu; Niyaayappiramaanaththirkuppinbu Undaana Aanaiyode Vilangiya Vasanamo Endrendraikkum Pooranaraana Kumaaranai Erpaduththugiradhu.
